full_summary:
=====================================

**Notice Title / Titre de l'avis: W6856-24V302 – RISO Supply Bulk Propane for DND / OCIR Fournir Propane en Vrac pour MDN**
=====================================

**Reference Number: WS4397013842-Doc4397015409**
=====================================

*   **Amendment Number: 1**
*   **Solicitation Number: WS4397013842**
*   **Publication Date: April 15, 2024**
*   **Tender Closing Date: May 7, 2024, at 2:00 pm (local time)**

**Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer (Demande d’offre à commandes)**
=====================================

The Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), is seeking Suppliers for the procurement of Bulk Propane for DND Valcartier sites in Quebec.

**Contract Details:**
---------------------

*   **UNSpsc Codes:** Propane (15111501), Supply of natural gas (83101601)
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Quebec
*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services

**Submission Instructions:**
---------------------------

Suppliers interested in participating in this procurement must submit their responses electronically through the Bid Solicitation website. Contact information for inquiries is as follows:

*   **Julie Carbonneau**
*   **Email:** <julie.carbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
*   **Notice URL:** <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19404281?extsite=MTk0MDQyODFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

**Important Dates:**
-------------------

*   **Publication Date:** April 15, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** May 7, 2024, at 2:00 pm (local time) 

Please make sure to format it to your heart's content but avoid excessive writing. You may want to help me ensure that all the necessary information is
